tool_description: Calculates menu item profitability by analyzing recipe costs against target margins and market pricing to recommend optimal menu prices.

target_food_cost_percentage.description: Target food cost as percentage of menu price (20-40)

market_price_low.description: Lower bound of market price range for similar items

market_price_high.description: Upper bound of market price range for similar items

competitor_average_price.description: Average competitor price for similar menu item

error_messages: Recipe not found: No recipe exists with the provided recipe_id
Invalid food cost percentage: Target must be between 20 and 40 percent
Invalid market price range: Market price low must be less than market price high
Missing recipe cost data: Recipe must be costed before profitability analysis
Unrealistic margins: Target margins may not be achievable at market prices
usage: Provide recipe_id and target_food_cost_percentage. Optionally include market pricing data for competitive analysis. The tool recommends optimal pricing strategy.

recommended_menu_price.description: Recommended menu price based on target margins

actual_food_cost_percentage.description: Actual food cost percentage at recommended price

profit_per_serving.description: Profit per serving at recommended price

competitive_position.description: Position relative to market prices (below, competitive, above)

margin_analysis.description: Analysis of margin achievability and recommendations
